title: Fred Beck EPDG (sold)  & Decon Phillippe Tolstoi for sale

posts.post_title: Fred Beck EPDG (sold)  & Decon Phillippe Tolstoi for sale
posts.post_content:
couple of tough low population front/back combos for sale: 

T206 Phillippe Tolstoi SGC 3 (6 total graded 1 higher) a 4 sold for $1k.  asking $350 shipped.  

Fred Beck EPDG SGC 4.5 (9 total graded 2 higher) asking $OLD shipped PPFF preferred.  PM for offers and/or more details/pix. Thanks!
